direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add an element to another element, but at different positions (end vs. start).
Both methods involve adding a node to an element, with similar control flow and parameter handling.
Both methods insert child nodes into an element, but with different positions and collections.
Both methods manipulate the structure of the element by adding or modifying child nodes.
Both methods modify the state of the element by altering its child nodes.

enhanced_by.reason: Ensures the child nodes list is initialized before appending or prepending elements.
Reparents the child node before appending it to the new parent element.
Ensures the child elements list is updated and consistent after appending or prepending elements.
